00035 typedef void (*RecordFunc)(void *, simtime_t, double, double);

00037 class cEnum;

00047 class SIM_API cOutVector : public cNoncopyableOwnedObject
00048 {
00049   protected:
00050     enum {FL_ENABLED = 4}; // flag: when false, record() method will do nothing
00051 
00052     void *handle;        // identifies output vector for the output vector manager
00053     simtime_t last_t;    // last timestamp written, needed to ensure increasing timestamp order
00054     long num_received;   // total number of values passed to the output vector object
00055     long num_stored;     // number of values actually stored
00056 
00057     // the following members will be used directly by inspectors
00058     RecordFunc record_in_inspector; // to notify inspector about file writes
00059     void *data_for_inspector;
00060 
00061   public:
00062     // internal: called from behind cEnvir
00063     void setCallback(RecordFunc f, void *d) {record_in_inspector=f; data_for_inspector=d;}
00064 
00065   public:
00066     enum Type { TYPE_INT, TYPE_DOUBLE, TYPE_ENUM };
00067     enum InterpolationMode { NONE, SAMPLE_HOLD, BACKWARD_SAMPLE_HOLD, LINEAR };
00068 
00069   public:
00075     explicit cOutVector(const char *name=NULL);
00076 
00080     virtual ~cOutVector();
00082 
00085 
00090     virtual void setName(const char *name);
00091 
00096     virtual std::string info() const;
00097 
00102     virtual void parsimPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00103 
00108     virtual void parsimUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00110 
00120     virtual void setEnum(const char *registeredEnumName);
00121 
00129     virtual void setEnum(cEnum *enumDecl);
00130 
00136     virtual void setUnit(const char *unit);
00137 
00144     virtual void setType(Type type);
00145 
00151     virtual void setInterpolationMode(InterpolationMode mode);
00152 
00159     virtual void setMin(double minValue);
00160 
00167     virtual void setMax(double maxValue);
00169 
00178     virtual bool record(double value);
00179 
00183     virtual bool record(SimTime value)  {return record(value.dbl());}
00184 
00194     virtual bool recordWithTimestamp(simtime_t t, double value);
00195 
00199     virtual bool recordWithTimestamp(simtime_t t, SimTime value) {return recordWithTimestamp(t, value.dbl());}
00200 
00204     virtual void enable()  {setFlag(FL_ENABLED,true);}
00205 
00210     virtual void disable()  {setFlag(FL_ENABLED,false);}
00211 
00216     virtual void setEnabled(bool b)  {setFlag(FL_ENABLED,b);}
00217 
00221     virtual bool isEnabled() const  {return flags&FL_ENABLED;}
00222 
00228     long getValuesReceived() const  {return num_received;}
00229 
00235     long getValuesStored() const  {return num_stored;}
00237 };
